page.title: 01Introduction,Bromley,S.E.
page.content: The south-eastern outskirts of the London Borough of Bromley is an attractive residential area, interspersed with green belt land.The villages of Farnborough,Pratts Bottom and Green Street Green provide a distinct,but individual,character,and enjoy a variety of local activities. Orpington and Bromley are the nearest towns,and many people commute to London for business. The interests of the area are served by councillors who attend meetings at Bromley Town Hall,the centre of local government,and local residents' associations are also very active.The area sends representatives to the Greater London Council,although this is due to be abolished in 1986. Altogether this is a popular and pleasant area,with good amenities within easy distance.
